definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]

sentences.english: Hey fellas have you heard the news?
sentences.chinese: 嘿家伙你听到这个消息？

sentences.english: That was so cool! Hey, Dad, did you see that?
sentences.chinese: 哇，好好玩啦嘿，爸爸看到没有？

sentences.english: Hey,my sweetheart,time to get up for school.
sentences.chinese: 嘿，宝贝儿，该起床上学了。

sentences.english: Hi. Jane, toss my sweater out!
sentences.chinese: 嘿，简，把我的毛衣扔出来。

sentences.english: Hey, you didn't forget about the D-man, did you?
sentences.chinese: 嘿，你没忘掉那个竹本君吧？
嘿，朋友就应该是这样的。

sentences.english: Hey, Rod, maybe, you shouldn't fight that this week.
sentences.chinese: 嘿，罗得，也许，你不该这周去挑战极限。

sentences.english: Hey, I like these jade bears here .
sentences.chinese: 嘿，我比较喜欢这些玉熊。

sentences.english: The bear clawed snow, hey, snow has a sweet potato.
sentences.chinese: 小熊扒开雪，嘿，雪底下有一只白薯。

sentences.english: Kaen : hello darkness, my old friend.
Oh, look at this clothing store for children.
sentences.chinese: 嘿，看这家儿童服装店的摆设。

sentences.english: Have you ever been talking with other people , "Hey, Let's have a frozen cake?"
sentences.chinese: 你有没有过跟别人说“嘿，我们吃冻糕吧？”

sentences.english: Hey guys n gals try this if u have guts to score high n high.
sentences.chinese: 嘿家伙列印囡囡尝试，如果有胆量的得分高N高。

sentences.english: Heh - heh - heh, I got the whole info from the upperclassman.
sentences.chinese: 嘿，我从学长那儿得到了所有的消息。

sentences.english: Hey, a pet shop. Let's go in and have a look.
sentences.chinese: 嘿，宠物商店，我们进去看一看吧。

sentences.english: Thanks fro that O, NEAL, Hey, you go and take them out with your Ninjas .
sentences.chinese: 由于来回的约尼尔，嘿，你去和他们与您的忍者。

definition: hey!/(interjection used to attract attention or to express surprise or disapprobation)
sentence-final particle (abbr. for 呢啊[ne5 a5] or variant of 哪[na5])
interjection of wonder, shock or admiration
interjection indicating approval, appreciation or agreement
abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin
(interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)
(interjection of surprise, pain, annoyance etc)/Oh my!/Uh-oh!/Ah!/Ouch!
elder brother (often used self-referentially)/(form of address between male friends) old chap/buddy
